Bajaj-Finance-welcome-hi.wav.text: Dear Customer, Main Disha Bajaj Finance se, kya main aapse Do minute baat kar sakti hu

previousConversation-hi.wav.text: hamaaree pichhalee baatacheet ke anusaar, aapako suchit kiya jata hai ki aapaka EMI Rs. 1000 abhi bhi Overdue hai aur aapko iska payment aaj hi karna he. Kripaya bataye aap kis mode se payment karenge ? Online ya Bajaj branch

Bajaj-Finance-paymentMethod-hi.wav.text: krypya batay  aap kis channel se payment karenge PAYTM, Google pay Mobikwik phonepay ya net banking .

thankyouNew-hi.wav.text: aapki pushti k dhanyawad. Kya aapko payment link prapt hua hai?

paymentLinkDwara-hi.wav.text: kripaya payment link dwara aaj hi payment kare. Apka din subh ho

confirmationThankYouNew-hi.wav.text: aapki pushti ke liye dhanyawad, aapko registered mobile number pe SMS dwara payment link jaldhi prapt hoga. Apka din subh ho

thankyou-hi.wav.text: aapki pushti ke liye dhanyawad. Kripaya aaj hi apne nazdiki bajaj branch me payment kare. Apka din subh ho

sorry-hi.wav.text: Apaka credit score banaye rakhne ke liye ye bahot avashyak hai ki aap aapka EMI payment  samay par kare, jisase aapko aage  penalty na lage. Aapki suvidha ke liya aapko sms dwara  payment link prapt hoga. aapka din subh ho.

paymentLink-en.wav.text: kshma kare, hum aapko samajhne me asamarth hai, ham aapse phir sampark banane  ka prayas karenge…aapka kimati samay dene ke liye dhanyvaad… apka din shubh ho

No-hi.wav.text: ye call aapke liye bahut important he. kripaya apna keemti samay de. Aapka bajaj finance ka EMI Rs.1000 abhi tak hame prapt nahi hua hai,aapko iska payment aaj hi karna hai. Kripaya bataye aap kis mode se payment karenge ? Online ya Bajaj branch

paymentLink-en.wav.text: Response repeating again and again. Please wait while we transfer the call to live agent.
